item.description:
Weekly Book Club

Enhancing spirituality and personal growth...

Now Reading......

How Did I Get Here? by Barbara DeAngelis

An inspirational book for anyone going through change, challenge or re-evaluation in any aspect of life. A guide to achieving emotional and spiritual rebirth.

Book club is from 6:00 pm to 7:15 pm.
Please try to arrive by 5:50 pm if you can.

There is a one-time $5 charge to be a part of the book club. Payable at your first or second meeting.

A special thank you to La Quinta Inn for donating their function room to us. If you have out of town guests, please consider putting them up at this quaint, adorable Inn.

More About The Book Club...
The purpose of this book club is to read from life-changing books that help to gain insight on ourselves, our relationships and increase our spirituality.

Unlike other book clubs, we read the book together, one or more chapters at a time (no need to read ahead of time unless you miss a meeting).  We then take turns sharing our insights and perspectives on what was read. After all have shared we open it up for discussion.

You can buy the books on your own or get them out of the library. You can usually find used books in good condition on Amazon, Ebay, Valorebooks.com, etc. I usually have a couple for sale for around $5-$7.

We read one book at a time which could take several weeks or months. Once that book is completed, we start another one.
item.how_to_find_us: See description for meeting location and times.
item.name: Book Club - How Did I Get Here?
